thread.title: Cleveland Browns' Mike Pettine recaps Sunday's win

title: Cleveland Browns' Mike Pettine recaps Sunday's win
text:
Cleveland Browns' Mike Pettine recaps Sunday's win Follow along with the head coach's press conference at 3:45 p.m. Monday. Post to Facebook Cleveland Browns' Mike Pettine recaps Sunday's win Follow along with the head coach's press conference at 3:45 p.m. Monday.  //on.wkyc.com/1RCZ1iQ   Join the Conversation To   Cleveland Browns' Mike Pettine recaps Sunday's win 3:04 p.m. EDT October 12, 2015 Follow along with the head coach's press conference at 3:45 p.m. Monday. Browns coach Mike Pettine wants to build on the positives of the 2014 regular season. (Photo: Ron Schwane-USA TODAY Sports) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
BEREA -- Between spectacular catches, a franchise-record setting game, and a glossy overtime finish, the Cleveland Browns' win on Sunday felt like a big one.
